languages.text: "Немногое. По уставу от предшественника к преемнику Мастера дисциплины передают особые предписания, больше похожие на жуткие легенды. И среди них есть упоминания о генокультах — тайных кланах, кликах и сектах, объединенных ксеносским заражением".

"Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."
languages.original_text: "Немногое. По уставу от предшественника к преемнику Мастера дисциплины передают особые предписания, больше похожие на жуткие легенды. И среди них есть упоминания о генокультах — тайных кланах, кликах и сектах, объединенных ксеносским заражением".

traits.locale_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

"Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

languages.text: “我了解得很少。按照规定，每位戒律大师都会向继任者传达某些特别的指示，而这些特别指示更像是令人不安的故事。其中，一部分故事提到了某种基因邪教，还提到了隐秘的氏族、集团与教派。这些团体都有个共同特征，那就是异形的污染。”
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

traits.locale_text: “我了解得很少。按照规定，每位戒律大师都会向继任者传达某些特别的指示，而这些特别指示更像是令人不安的故事。其中，一部分故事提到了某种基因邪教，还提到了隐秘的氏族、集团与教派。这些团体都有个共同特征，那就是异形的污染。”

languages.text: «Muy poco. Según la normativa, todo maestro de armas debe transmitir instrucciones especiales a su sucesor, instrucciones que más bien parecen historias de terror. En algunos se mencionan los cultos genéticos, una serie de clanes, cábalas y sectas clandestinas que tienen un rasgo en común: están infestados de xenos».
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

traits.locale_text: «Muy poco. Según la normativa, todo maestro de armas debe transmitir instrucciones especiales a su sucesor, instrucciones que más bien parecen historias de terror. En algunos se mencionan los cultos genéticos, una serie de clanes, cábalas y sectas clandestinas que tienen un rasgo en común: están infestados de xenos».

languages.text: 「ほとんど。規則に従い、マスター・アット・アームは後継者に特別な指示を伝えます。その中には、遺伝子カルトについて言及しているものも。異種族の侵入という共通の特徴を持つ、秘密の一族、徒党、そして宗派です」
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

traits.locale_text: 「ほとんど。規則に従い、マスター・アット・アームは後継者に特別な指示を伝えます。その中には、遺伝子カルトについて言及しているものも。異種族の侵入という共通の特徴を持つ、秘密の一族、徒党、そして宗派です」

languages.text: "Nicht viel. Gemäß Statuten gibt jeder Waffenmeister spezielle Anweisungen an seinen Nachfolger weiter ... Anweisungen, die eher beunruhigenden Geschichten gleichen. In einigen von ihnen ist von genetischen Kulten die Rede ... geheimen Clans, Banden und Sekten, die alle ein gemeinsames Merkmal tragen ... sie sind von Xenos befallen."
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht viel. Gemäß Statuten gibt jeder Waffenmeister spezielle Anweisungen an seinen Nachfolger weiter ... Anweisungen, die eher beunruhigenden Geschichten gleichen. In einigen von ihnen ist von genetischen Kulten die Rede ... geheimen Clans, Banden und Sekten, die alle ein gemeinsames Merkmal tragen ... sie sind von Xenos befallen."

languages.text: « Pas grand-chose. Conformément à la réglementation, chaque capitaine d'armes transmet des instructions particulières à son successeur, des instructions qui s'apparentent davantage à une collection d'histoires troublantes. Certaines évoquent les cultes génétiques, des clans et sectes clandestines qui partagent tous une caractéristique commune : celle d'être infestés par les xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."

traits.locale_text: « Pas grand-chose. Conformément à la réglementation, chaque capitaine d'armes transmet des instructions particulières à son successeur, des instructions qui s'apparentent davantage à une collection d'histoires troublantes. Certaines évoquent les cultes génétiques, des clans et sectes clandestines qui partagent tous une caractéristique commune : celle d'être infestés par les xénos. »

languages.text: "Çok az şey biliyorum. Mevzuat uyarınca her bir Silahtar, halefine özel talimatlar iletir. Bunlar, talimattan ziyade huzursuz edici hikâyeleri andırır. Bazılarında genetik tarikatların bahsi geçer. Gizli klanlar, hizipler ve mezhepler, tek bir ortak paydada buluşurlar. Bu da zeno istilasıdır."
languages.original_text: "Very little. As per regulations, every Master-at-Arms passes on special instructions to their successor — instructions that more resemble disturbing tales. Some of them mention genetic cults — covert clans, cliques, and sects that all share one common trait: xenos infestation."
